No UNDP honcho has ever served 12 yrs (i.e. 3x4) https://t.co/pacsHEQFSU
(2/2) UNDP established 1966, had 5x US honchos till 1999, only one served >6 yrs. Then: Brown (UK) 6 yrs Derviş (Turkey) 4 yrs Clark 8 yrs
